newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was quiet late Friday. There were no sales of slaughter steers or heifers confirmed at the close.

Inquiry and demand were light. Sales confirmed last week on 81,700 head including 20,100 head or about 25 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle. Last sales Thursday, April 24 at 67.00, bids Friday morning 66.00-67.00, asking prices 67.00-69.00.
confirmed: none last week: none last year: none
